mainText:
Aloha Steve,
The greatest computer icon and creative mind on the planet!... I didn't 
even know him, but he will always be part of my life and in my 
professional career as a Graphics Designer. We will miss him 
tremendously... but he will live on forever and then some, kind'a like 
Elvis eh! Thanks so much Steve for your awesome contribution to 
technology, this world and humanity!
author: Sal
